creator: Stefan.Graeber.SG@germany.agfa.com
text:
The only thing, i'm missing in ANT, is a task to compile IDL files.
Are there any plans for the future ? A basic or optional task idlj like
it exists for rmic ?

See <http://ant.apache.org/external.html#IDLDepend>

Not a built-in task, but it should do what you want and comes with a reasonable
license.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
